name: Box: The Game
description: Box: The Game is a fun puzzle game which will challenge your brain to think in different ways. All cubes attach to each other, your goal is to match the displayed shape to continue to the next level.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: There are no intense graphics so any PC with DirectX 11 should be able to run it.
